item.title: How students use lecture recordings
item.description: The following post is a copy for my website of an article that was first published in the Media & Learning Newsletter. How students use lecture recordings At the University of MÃ¼nster, Germany, the lecture capture service started in the winter term 2016⁄17. The systematic evaluations of the first three semesters demonstrated: students like the service because it warrants more freedom in the everyday organization of their studies. Providing more students with lecture recordings was a hot topic in the students parliament elections.
